form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Schumer(for himself andMs. Collins) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to theCommittee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend and increase the exclusion for benefits provided to volunteer firefighters and emergency medical responders.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Volunteer Responder Incentive Protection Reauthorization Act of 2013 .

section.header: Benefits provided to volunteer firefighters and emergency medical responders

subsection.header: Increase in dollar limitation on qualified payments
subsection.text: Subparagraph (B) of section 139B(c)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986is amended by striking$30and inserting$50.
Subsection (d) ofsection 139Bof the Internal Revenue Code of 1986is amended by strikingbeginning after December 31, 2010.and inserting “beginning—

paragraph.text: after December 31, 2010, and before January 1, 2014, or

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2013.
